articles.title: Defense Secretary Discusses Force Posturing in Africa, Europe - Department of Defense
articles.description: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth spoke about DOD's force posturing priorities on the European and African continents while meeting with members of the media during a visit to U.S. Africa Command in
articles.content: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth today spoke about DOD's force posturing priorities on the European and African continents while meeting with members of the media during a visit to U.S. Africa Command … [+3351 chars]
